Przykłady 4.1.1 i 4.1.2 z książki Glassermana: 
```{r}
sampleS_T = function(S_0=50,sigma=.3,T=.25,r=.05) {
  Z = rnorm(1)
  S_T = S_0 * exp((r-sigma^2/2)*T + sigma*sqrt(T)*Z)
  return(S_T)
}
payoffEC = function(S_T, r=.05, T=.25, K=50) {
  Y = exp(-r*T) * max(0, S_T - K)
  return(Y)
}
expectedControlVariateS_T = function(S_0=50,T=.25,r=.05) {
  ES_T = exp(r*T) * S_0
  return(ES_T)
}
```
